amendment.description: Amendment reduces funds for the Operation and Maintenance Account, Defense-Wide by $2 million and increases funds for Alzheimer's disease research by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide by $2,000,000 and increase funds for the Defense Health Program by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Benishek amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Benishek amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Benishek.
